Introduction

Cha Hak Yeon, better known by his stage name N, is a South Korean Singer, Actor, Presenter, and, Radio Host signed under 51k. N is best known for being the Leader, Main Dancer, and Vocalist of the boy group VIXX which debuted in 2012.

N enlisted in the military on March 4, 2019, and was discharged on October 7, 2020. On October 31, 2020, N left Jellyfish Entertainment after he decided not to renew his contract, he joined 51k on November 3.
